name: Gunner Deadly Expedition
description:
Gunner Deadly expedition - In this shoot em up + platformer hybrid game, you have to fight hordes of your evil clones who are trying to ruin your vacation. Take your rifle and show who's in charge. Shoot enemies one by one, jump across platforms and look for golden keys to help you move to the next level of this hardcore game. Be careful - dexterity and accuracy in shooting are just as important as your agility and platform jumping!

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack
